headline: ON Semiconductor (ON): Reassessing Valuation After a 17% One-Month Share Price Rebound
summary: ON Semiconductor (ON) has quietly staged a rebound, with shares up around 17% over the past month after a rough year. That recovery has investors asking whether the reset is already priced in. See our latest analysis for ON Semiconductor. That 17% 1 month share price return at around $54.96 comes after a tough stretch, with year to date share price returns still negative and 1 year total shareholder returns in the red. This suggests the recent momentum is more of a reset than a breakout. If...
